themes.name: Video Games
themes.description: Build games from scratch, exploring mechanics from physics to networking

themes.name: Creative Coding
themes.description: Generative art, shaders, and audio-visual experiments

themes.name: Build Your Own X
themes.description: Demystify tools by rebuilding them: databases, shells, interpreters

themes.name: Tools & Hardware
themes.description: Practical utilities and physical computing projects

themes.name: Wild Card
themes.description: Flexible weeks for exploration, collaboration, or polish

projects.title: Pong Clone
projects.concept: Game loop, delta time, basic collision
projects.description: The classic that started it all. Learn the fundamentals of game loops, frame-independent movement with delta time, and simple AABB collision detection.

projects.title: Breakout
projects.description: Manage dozens of bricks efficiently. Learn sprite batching, object pooling to avoid garbage collection, and level design basics.

projects.title: Platformer (Mario-style)
projects.description: Master the feel of a good jump. Implement gravity, variable jump height, coyote time, and tile-based collision detection.

projects.title: Top-down Shooter
projects.description: Bullets everywhere! Work with 2D vectors, create interesting bullet patterns, and build robust enemy spawning systems.

projects.title: Roguelike (7DRL style)
projects.description: Generate infinite dungeons. Implement BSP or cellular automata for level generation, plus turn-based game flow.

projects.title: Tower Defense
projects.description: Enemies that find their way. Implement A* pathfinding, build a wave spawning system, and handle tower targeting logic.

projects.title: Fighting Game
projects.description: Frame-perfect combat. Build character state machines, separate hitbox/hurtbox systems, and understand frame advantage.

projects.title: Card Battler
projects.concept: Game state management, turn logic, effect systems
projects.description: Slay the Spire vibes. Handle complex game state, implement a turn system, and build composable card effect systems.

projects.title: Puzzle Game (Sokoban)
projects.description: Push boxes, solve puzzles. Implement grid-based movement, robust undo/redo with command pattern, and level serialization.

projects.title: Visual Novel
projects.concept: Dialogue systems, branching narratives, save states
projects.description: Tell interactive stories. Build a dialogue engine, handle branching paths, and implement save/load for complex state.

projects.title: Multiplayer Game
projects.description: Real-time multiplayer. Learn client-server architecture, state synchronization, and lag compensation techniques.

projects.title: 3D Software Renderer
projects.description: 3D without a GPU. Implement matrix transforms, perspective projection, and triangle rasterization from scratch.

projects.title: Raycasting Maze (Wolfenstein)
projects.description: Fake 3D that fooled everyone in 1992. Cast rays to render walls, handle texturing, and create that classic FPS feel.

projects.title: Physics Sandbox
projects.concept: Rigid body physics, constraints, impulse resolution
projects.description: Make things bounce and collide. Implement rigid body dynamics, collision response, and simple constraints.

projects.title: Game Jam Polish Week
projects.description: Make it feel good. Add screenshake, particles, sound effects, and learn to package and publish a game.

projects.title: Terrain Generator
projects.description: Mountains from math. Use noise functions to generate realistic heightmaps, add erosion, and render as 2D or 3D terrain.

projects.title: Particle Fireworks
projects.description: Explosions of color. Build a flexible particle system with emitters, forces, lifetime, and blending modes.

projects.title: Fractal Explorer
projects.description: Infinite complexity. Render the Mandelbrot set, implement smooth coloring, and add infinite zoom capabilities.

projects.title: Procedural Trees
projects.description: Grow digital forests. Implement L-systems to generate realistic branching structures and procedural plants.

projects.title: Shader Art
projects.description: Paint with math. Write fragment shaders to create mesmerizing visual effects, learn GLSL syntax and patterns.

projects.title: Audio Visualizer
projects.description: See the music. Use FFT to analyze audio frequencies, detect beats, and create reactive visual experiences.

projects.title: Game of Life Variants
projects.description: Emergence from simple rules. Implement Conway's Game of Life, then explore variations and custom rulesets.

projects.title: Flocking Simulation
projects.description: Birds of a feather. Implement Reynolds' boids with separation, alignment, and cohesion for natural swarm behavior.

projects.title: Flow Field Art
projects.description: Particles that follow invisible currents. Create vector fields from noise, trace particles through them for organic art.

projects.title: Ray Marching Scene
projects.description: 3D without polygons. Use signed distance functions to render complex 3D scenes entirely in a fragment shader.

projects.title: Generative Music Tool
projects.description: Music that writes itself. Build a sequencer with algorithmic composition rules, explore generative melodies and rhythms.

projects.title: Interactive Installation
projects.description: Art that responds. Use webcam or microphone input to create interactive visual experiences that react to the viewer.

projects.title: HTTP Server
projects.description: The foundation of the web. Parse HTTP requests, handle routing, serve static files, all from raw sockets.

projects.title: Key-Value Database
projects.description: Your own Redis. Implement in-memory storage with persistence, learn about write-ahead logs and basic indexing.

projects.title: Unix Shell
projects.description: Command your computer. Fork processes, connect them with pipes, handle signals, implement builtins.

projects.title: Regex Engine
projects.description: Match patterns like a pro. Build NFAs from regex syntax, convert to DFAs, and run pattern matching.

projects.title: Git (Simplified)
projects.description: Version control demystified. Implement blob storage, commits as DAG nodes, branches, and basic merge.

projects.title: Lisp Interpreter
projects.description: Code that runs code. Tokenize, parse S-expressions, build an AST, and evaluate with lexical scoping.

projects.title: Stack-based VM
projects.description: Your own virtual machine. Design an instruction set, compile to bytecode, execute on a stack-based VM.

projects.title: Terminal Text Editor
projects.concept: Buffer gap, escape codes, cursor handling
projects.description: Edit text in the terminal. Handle raw terminal input, implement efficient text buffers, render with ANSI codes.

projects.title: Static Site Generator
projects.description: Your own Hugo. Parse Markdown, apply templates, generate a full static website from content files.

projects.title: Load Balancer
projects.description: Distribute the load. Implement reverse proxying, multiple balancing strategies, and backend health monitoring.

projects.title: Message Queue
projects.description: Async communication backbone. Build publish/subscribe, message persistence, and consumer groups.

projects.title: Code Linter
projects.description: Lint your own code. Parse source into AST, traverse to find issues, report with helpful messages.

projects.title: CLI File Organizer
projects.description: Tame your downloads folder. Build a CLI tool that sorts files by type, date, or custom rules.

projects.title: Browser Extension
projects.description: Extend your browser. Build a tab manager, bookmark tool, or productivity extension using WebExtension APIs.

projects.title: Personal Dashboard
projects.description: Your life at a glance. Aggregate data from multiple APIs, display weather, tasks, calendar, and custom widgets.

projects.title: Meal Planner
projects.description: Plan your meals like you already do. Build a tool with recipes, calorie calculations, and weekly planning.

projects.title: Raspberry Pi Weather Station
projects.description: Physical computing intro. Read temperature and humidity sensors, log data over time, display on screen or web.

projects.title: Custom Game Controller
projects.description: Play games your way. Build a custom controller with Arduino that registers as a USB HID device.

projects.title: LED Matrix Display
projects.description: Light up your desk. Drive an LED matrix, implement pixel buffering, create animations and scrolling text.

projects.title: Home Automation Trigger
projects.description: Smart home DIY. Build sensors that trigger actions via MQTT or webhooks, integrate with existing systems.

projects.title: Childhood Game Remake
projects.description: Recreate a game from memory. Figure out the mechanics of something you loved, rebuild it with fresh eyes.

projects.title: Collaboration Week
projects.description: Find a partner online and build something together. Practice git workflows, code review, and communication.

projects.title: Port Week
projects.description: Take a previous project and rewrite it in a different language or for a different platform.

projects.title: Speedrun Week
projects.description: Three tiny projects in one week. Practice scoping small, shipping fast, and iterating quickly.

projects.title: Polish Week
projects.description: Revisit your favorite project from the year. Add polish, write documentation, make it portfolio-ready.
